historical:
Legislative History of Laws

For Law 17-168, see notes following § 8-403.01.

DC CODE § 8-403.04

Current through December 11, 2012

sections.text: If a pesticide designated by the Mayor as reduced-risk pursuant to subsection (b) of this subsection is applied, the operator shall indicate on the customer notice provided in § 8-403.01(a)(9) that the customer has selected a reduced-risk pesticide.
Within 6 months of June 5, 2008, the Mayor shall approve a list of reduced-risk pesticides and methods of pest control.

title.text: Environmental and Animal Control and Protection (Refs & Annos)

heading.catch_text: Reduced-risk pesticides and methods of pest control.
